rationale: High in-degree (1280) indicates it receives a lot of funds, while a moderate out-degree (523) suggests it disburses funds actively, typical of an exchange hot wallet.
No incoming transactions and a high out-degree (151) suggest this address is primarily used for outgoing payments, characteristic of a retail user.
Similar to the previous case, this address has no incoming transactions and a high out-degree (150), suggesting personal payments.
Moderate in-degree (75) and low out-degree (23), typical of anonymity services.
Moderate in-degree (64) with a low out-degree (22) indicates an aggregator service.
High in-degree (70) and very low out-degree (1) suggest mining pool payout address.
